<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get DNS records by domain ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mailserver/domains/dns/get"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns DNS records related to the domain with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Domain ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"DNS records associated with the domain","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"MxRecord":{"type":"object","properties":{"Host":{"type":"string","example":"Host"},"Priority":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"IsVerified":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ServerDomainMxRecordData"},"SpfRecord":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","example":"name"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsVerified":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ServerDomainDnsRecordData"},"DkimRecord":{"type":"object","properties":{"Selector":{"type":"string","example":"Selector"},"PublicKey":{"type":"string","example":"PublicKey"},"IsVerified":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ServerDomainDkimRecordData"},"DomainCheckRecord":{"type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","example":"name"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsVerified":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ServerDomainDnsRecordData"},"IsVerified":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"ServerDomainDnsData"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
